author: gmsx
title: VERY DISAPPOINTED BY GLUED MINIFIGURES
review:
A friend told me already and when I got this set today I was very disappointed to have the confirmation that the 3 minifigures are glued on the magnet, unlike the several ones I bought before.

There will of course be a company's policy behind this, but if they keep being glued I don't see the point in buying any more magnets.
